title: 'Cult Mom' Lori Vallow claims she's getting 'peeped on' behind bars
itunes:title: 'Cult Mom' Lori Vallow claims she's getting 'peeped on' behind bars
description:
CULT MOM Lori Vallow tries again to gain bail, and her mom speaks out for the first time. Where are her missing children? Vallow still has not revealed where JJ and Tylee are.

Joining Nancy Grace today to discuss:

  • Ashley Willcott - Judge and trial attorney, Anchor on Court TV
  • Caryn Stark - NYC Psychologist
  • Sheryl McCollum - Director of the Atlanta Cold Case Investigative Research Institute
  • Joseph Scott Morgan - Professor of Forensics Jacksonville State University, Author of "Blood Beneath My Feet"
  • Nate Eaton- Reporter at East Idaho News 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
